com.llsx.pps.session

Class SessionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.llsx.pps.session.SessionManager

  • public class SessionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the device session along with who else is in the same session.

      • addAvailableSession

        public void addAvailableSession(java.lang.String sessionId,
                       java.lang.Boolean isLock)
        Adds the newly created or newly received session to the list of sessions.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - unique identifier (ID) of the session
        isLock - whether or not the session is locked

      • removeAvailableSession

        public void removeAvailableSession(java.lang.String sessionId)
        Removes the session from the session list with the specified session ID.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - unique identifier (ID) of the session

      • getAvailableSessions

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAvailableSessions()
        Returns:
        A Set<String> of all session IDs that can be accessed, whether locked or unlocked.

      • requestSessions

        public void requestSessions()
        Sends an event to all devices requesting for all the known sessions.

      • createSession

        public java.lang.String createSession(java.lang.String sessionName)
        Creates a new session given a unique name for the session. Also announces the creation of the session to other devices.
        Parameters:
        sessionName - unique name for the session
        Returns:
        The session identifier (ID), which is a String containing the session name and the device name.

      • setChosenSession

        public void setChosenSession(java.lang.String sessionId)
        Sets the given session as the current session.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the selected session to be made into the current session

      • setDefaultSession

        public void setDefaultSession()
        Sets the default session as the current session.

      • lockSession

        public void lockSession(java.lang.String sessionId)
        Locks the given session so that no one new can join.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the selected session to lock

      • unlockSession

        public void unlockSession(java.lang.String sessionId)
        Unlocks the given session so that other people can join.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the selected session to lock

      • isSessionLocked

        public java.lang.Boolean isSessionLocked(java.lang.String sessionId)
        Checks if the given session is locked.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the selected session to check
        Returns:
        true if the session is locked, otherwise false. null if the session does not exist.

      • addDevice

        public void addDevice(java.lang.String deviceId,
             java.lang.String deviceName)
        Register a new device given its unique identifier (device ID) and its name representation (e.g. "Player 1").
        Parameters:
        deviceId - unique identifier (ID) of the device
        deviceName - name representation for the device

      • removeDevice

        public void removeDevice(java.lang.String deviceId)
        Removes the device from the list of devices given the device identifier.
        Parameters:

        Gets the name representation (e.g. "Player 1") of the target device given the device's identifier (ID).
        Parameters:
        deviceId - node name of the target alias
        Returns:
        alias name of the node given a key / node name or null if it doesn't exist.

        Gets the identifier (ID) of the target device given the device's name representation (e.g. "Player 1").
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The device ID of the target device given its name representation.

        Parameters:
        deviceName - the name you want for the current device

      • isSessionMode

        public boolean isSessionMode()
        Returns:
        true if the app is on session management mode; false if the app is in app mode.

      • setSessionMode

        public void setSessionMode(boolean sessionMode)
        Sets the current session mode as the given session mode.
        Parameters:
        sessionMode - true if the app should be in session management mode; false if the app should be in app mode

        Returns:
